mapper.insert: INSERT INTO COMMUTE_RECORD (NO, USER_NO , WORK_START_TIME, DAY_OF_WEEK) VALUES (SEQ_COMMUTE_RECORD_NO.NEXTVAL ,#{no} ,#{currentTimestamp} ,#{currentDayOfWeek})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM COMMUTE_RECORD WHERE USER_NO = #{no} ORDER BY NO DESC FETCH FIRST ROW ONLY
SELECT WORK_START_TIME FROM COMMUTE_RECORD WHERE NO = #{workoutNo} AND WORK_START_TIME IS NOT NULL ORDER BY WORK_START_TIME DESC FETCH FIRST ROW ONLY
SELECT WORK_END_TIME FROM COMMUTE_RECORD WHERE NO = #{workoutNo} AND WORK_END_TIME IS NOT NULL ORDER BY WORK_END_TIME DESC FETCH FIRST ROW ONLY
